conference.title: Lightning PHP Conference
conference.summary: The inaugural [Lightning PHP Conference](https://lightningphp.org "Lightning PHP 2019") - this one day event will be held in Tampa, Florida on Friday, October 4th, 2019. We look forward to an incredible day of learning, networking, and fun as we invite the PHP world to join us as part of our Lightning PHP community!
conference.content: The inaugural [Lightning PHP Conference](https://lightningphp.org "Lightning PHP 2019") - this one day event will be held in Tampa, Florida on Friday, October 4th, 2019. We look forward to an incredible day of learning, networking, and fun as we invite the PHP world to join us as part of our Lightning PHP community!
